text:
Arlene will keep us posted on the progress of the AERT action. Will
you advise us of the status of the proposal in so far as NAEB is concerned?
The wheels are in motion for the AERT vote.
Sincerely,
Leo A. Martin
President, AERT
Frank Schooley
President, NAEB
School of Journalism
Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
